Inform eventdispatcher on node reordering (fixes #16992)
data.body: When changing the order of a node associated to the scene graph priority listener, inform eventdispatcher of the change

data.title: Added support for larger tilemaps in CCFastTMXTiledMap
data.body:
Added a compiler flag for larger tilemaps, by using 32 bit indices. If the compiler flag CC_FAST_TILEMAP_32_BIT_INDICES is defined, the tilemap can render maps bigger than 128x128 tiles. Perhaps there are other ways to do this (via CCConfiguration), but this allows the developer to use bigger maps without having to change the source code.

I made this PR because of the forum post: http://discuss.cocos2d-x.org/t/experimental-tmxtiledmap-maps-bigger-than-128x128-with-32-bit-indices/33876

[Editbox bug] Xcode Device Orientation Portrait
data.body:
- cocos2d-x version: 3.11.1
- devices test on: iphone6 6p 6s 6sp 7 
- developing environments
   - NDK version:
   - Xcode version:8.1
   - VS version:
   - browser type and version:

Steps to Reproduce:
1. 勾选Xcode中 Device Orientation 的 Portrait 选项。
1.Check this Portrait checkbox .[Xcode -> Device Orientation -> Portrait]
2. 点击Editbox输入完任意字符后，屏幕有较大几率飞到左下角
2.Running this application on iphone6.
Frame may be moving to the left corner of the  screen, after input any words int the EditBox[widget].

data.title: Synchronize creator engine bug fixes and upgrade web engine
Fix calculation of first word length (fixes #16889)
Calling reorderChild does not update TouchListener with scene graph priority
data.body:
- cocos2d-x version: 3.13.1
- devices test on: Windows UWP / Android
- developing environments
   - NDK version: 11
   - Xcode version:
   - VS version: 15
   - browser type and version:

See also: http://discuss.cocos2d-x.org/t/updating-scene-graph-event-order-in-node-sortallchildren/17961/1

Steps to Reproduce:

Parent Node:
- has Child Node 1 (added first -> lower zorder)
- has Child Node 2 (added second -> higher zorder)

Child Node 1:
- has TouchListener (self as target) with scene graph priority

Child Node 2:
- has TouchListener (self as target) with scene graph priority

Before:
- Child Node 2 gets touch event before Child Node 1 (because higher zorder)

Reorder:
- Calling reorderChild for Child Node 1 on Parent Node (Child Node 1 has now higher zorder)

After:
- Child Node 2 still gets touch event before Child Node 1 (but it has lower zorder now)
- BUG? Touch Priority not updated with reorderChild?

data.title: To use some HTTP client library those use `send(null)` like `superage…
data.body: To use some HTTP client library those use `XMLHttpRequest.send(null)` like `superagent`,`XMLHTTPRequest` should send a empty request instead of abort.

data.title: [android] Catches ‘NumberFormatException’ while invoking Integer.parseInt.
data.body: Also catches ‘NullPointerException’ while converting Integer to int in Cocos2dxActivity.hideVirtualButton.

data.title: Do not wrap label on non-wrappable spaces (fixes #16939)
data.body:
When a label is drawn and wrapping is enabled, text should not wrap on non-wrappable spaces.
Please note that no-break spaces and non-wrappable spaces are two different sets of unicode characters. The code prevents labels' text to wrap on non-wrappable spaces.

data.title: Fix CCParticleSystemQuad::setDisplayFrame()
data.body: CCParticleSystemQuad::setDisplayFrame() didn't used the rect for SpriteFrame
